overview: Fruh a farmer in his mid 30s lost his wife to the Covid 19 pandemic. He decides to isolate himself from any human contact until Bih a teacher who was travelling his path and finds his bush house. Fruh is furious and fears Bih might infect him. As he urges Bih to leave immediately he suddenly faints and is helped by the person whom he thought he didn't need.
title: Lukot
